data.name: Kawakami Finance
data.description: What Is Kawakami Finance (KKI)? Kawakami Finance is the organization behind the Kawakami Inu (KKI) token. Kawakami Inu is a meme cryptocurrency much like[ Dogecoin](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/dogecoin/),[ Baby Doge Coin](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/baby-doge-coin/) or[ Shiba Inu](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/shiba-inu/). The project plans to improve the meme cryptocurrency market by providing benefits to KKI holders like frictionless yield generation, an anti-rug-pull developer team, complete transparency with the community, prize awards, an NFT marketplace, and charity partnerships. The token aims to appeal to meme-based retail investors from the Gamestop and AMC craze of 2021. However, they aim to provide a safer path “to the moon” than other cryptos and meme investments. KKI is a part of a growing number of meme-based cryptocurrencies that place Inu dogs as a mascot. Who Are the Founders of Kawakami Finance? Kawakami Finance was founded in 2021, and like most other meme cryptos the founding team has kept mostly anonymous. However, the ambitious developer roadmap includes listing on centralized exchanges, establishing partnership networks, large NFT auctions, and increased charity work to save dogs all by early 2022. Those who wish to learn more about the community can join the project’s[ Telegram](https://kawakami.finance/) group. What Makes Kawakami Finance Unique? The main purpose of Kawakami Finance is to build a community of users to share in the increase of value in the KKI coin. The project will serve the users of the cryptocurrency as well as donate funds to charity for dogs. The project’s end goal is to become a leading crypto, much like Dogecoin, while saving all the dogs of the world. Related Pages: Learn more about [Shiba Inu](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/shiba-inu/). Learn more about [Alaska Inu ](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/alaska-inu/). Learn more about [Dogecoin](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/dogecoin/). Learn more about [Baby Doge Coin](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/baby-doge-coin/). How Many Kawakami Inu (KKI) Coins Are There in Circulation? Kawakami Inu has a starting supply of 100,000,000 tokens that are ownership renounced by the founding team. There will be a 10% tax on every transaction, 7% of which will be proportionately distributed to all HODLers automatically. How Is the Kawakami Finance Network Secured? Kawakami Inu is a[ BEP-20](https://coinmarketcap.com/alexandria/glossary/bep-20) coin that uses the[ Binance Smart Chain](https://coinmarketcap.com/alexandria/article/what-is-binance-smart-chain) to secure the network. BEP-20 coins are the Binance Chain standard similar to Ethereum’s ERC-20 standard. BSC combines both delegated PoS and proof-of-authority (PoA) to achieve network consensus and maintain blockchain security. Where Can You Buy Kawakami Inu (KKI)? Those who wish to buy KKI currently can only do so via[ PancakeSwap](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/pancakeswap/). The developer team promises more exchange options are currently in the works. [Find more information here](https://coinmarketcap.com/how-to-buy-bitcoin/) about buying cryptocurrency.
data.notice: Added on July 13: We have received multiple reports from users regarding buy/sell issues in KKI smart contract. Please exercise caution while trading..
